title: When to take a meeting (VC School) + Fungi Flour: Hyfé Foods Founder Michelle Ruiz (Climate) | E1488
description: For this week's VC Sunday School, Molly asks Jason about when to take a meeting with a founder (2:20). Then for This Week in Climate Startups, Molly speaks with the CEO and Founder of Hyfé Foods, Michelle Ruiz (16:45). Finally, as we're off tomorrow, we wrap with a couple of Juneteenth book recommendations (44:17).
author: Jason Calacanis
excerpt: Jason and Molly discuss the latest in crypto, including the Solana Whale, NFT NYC, and Magic Eden with guest Vinny Lingham. They explore Solend's takeover of a whale account, human intervention in crypto systems, and Terraform Labs' flight ban.
text: This Week in StartupsJason Calacanis covers startups, tech, markets, media, and all the hottest topics in business and technology. He also interviews the world’s greatest founders, operators, investors, and innovators. This Week in Startups

Jason Calacanis covers startups, tech, markets, media, and all the hottest topics in business and technology. He also interviews the world’s greatest founders, operators, investors, and innovators.

All episodes

E1489 • Jun 21, 2022 • 84 mins

Jason and Molly discuss the latest in crypto, including the Solana Whale, NFT NYC, and Magic Eden with guest Vinny Lingham. They explore Solend's takeover of a whale account, human intervention in crypto systems, and Terraform Labs' flight ban.
